short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beautiful and customizable new tab page for the Google Chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tabba is an extension for easily customizing your new tab with quick links to your favourite websites. Tabba also features a clock with different color modes. You can also set a custom wallpaper from your desktop. 

If you want more websites to be added let me know and if you have any questions or suggestions feel free to contact me
